Verses: 1 yaakkobu Than Thagappan Thangiyirundha Kaanaan Dhesaththile Kudiyirundhaan.

2 yaakkobudaiya Sandhadhiyin Varalaaru: Yoseppu Padhinezhu Vayadhile Than Sagodhararudane Aadugalai Meyththukkondirundhaan; Andha Ilaignan Pilgaal Silpaal Ennum Than Thagappanudaiya Marumanaiyaattigalin Kumaararode Irundhu, Avargaludaiya Thunmaarkgaththaith Than Thagappanukkuch Sollivaruvaan.
3  Isravelin Mudhirvayadhile Yosepputh Thanakkup Pirandhadhinaal, Isravel Than Kumaarar Ellaarilum Avanai Adhigamaai Nesiththu, Avanukkup Palavarunamaana Angiyaich Seyviththaan.
4 avanudaiya Sagodharar Ellaarilum Avanaith Thangal Thagappan Adhigamaai Nesikkiradhai Avan Sagodharar Kandapodhu, Avanode Patchamaaip Pesaamal Avanaip Pagaiththaargal.
5 yoseppu Oru Soppanam Kandu, Adhaith Than Sagodhararukku Ariviththaan; Adhinimiththam Avanai Innum Adhigamaaip Pagaiththaargal.
6 avan Avargalai Nokki: Naan Kanda Soppanaththaik Kelungal:
7 naam Vayalil Aruththa Arigalaik Kattikkondirundhom; Appozhudhu Ennudaiya Arikkattu Nimirndhirundhadhu; Ungal Arikgattukal En Arikgattaich Sutri Vanangi Nindradhu Endraan.

8 appozhudhu Avan Sagodharar Avanaip Paarththu: Nee Engalmel Thuraiththanam Pannuvaayo? Nee Engalai Aalappogiraayo? Endru Solli, Avanai Avan Soppanangalin Nimiththamum, Avan Vaarththaigalin Nimiththamum Innum Adhigamaaip Pagaiththaargal.
9 avan Veroru Soppanam Kandu, Than Sagodhararai Nokki: Naan Innum Oru Soppanaththaik Kanden; Sooriyanum Sandhiranum Padhinoru Natchaththirangalum Ennai Vananginadhu Endraan.

10  Idhai Avan Than Thagappanukkum Than Sagodhararukkum Sonnapodhu, Avan Thagappan Avanaip Paarththu: Nee Kanda Indhach Soppanam Enna? Naanum Un Thaayaarum Un Sagodhararum Tharaimattum Kunindhu Unnai Vananga Varuvomo? Endru Avanaik Kadindhukondaan.
11 avan Sagodharar Avanmel Poraamai Kondaargal; Avan Thagappano Avan Sonnadhai Manadhile Vaiththukkondaan.
12  Pinbu, Avan Sagodharar Seekemile Thangal Thagappanudaiya Aadugalai Meykkap Ponaargal.
13 appozhudhu Isravel Yoseppai Nokki: Un Sagodharar Seekemile Aadugalai Meykkiraargal Allavaa? Unnai Avargalidaththil Anuppappogiren, Vaa Endraan. Avan: Idho, Pogiren Endraan.

14 appozhudhu Avan: Nee Poi, Un Sagodhararudaiya Shemam Eppadi Endrum, Aadugal Eppadi Irukkiradhu Endrum Paarththu, Enakku Maruseydhi Konduvaa Endru Avanukkuch Solli, Ebiron Pallaththaakkile Irundhu Avanai Anuppinaan; Andhappadiye Avan Seekemukkup Ponaan.
15 appozhudhu Oru Manidhan Avan Veliyile Vazhidhappith Thirigiradhaikkandu, Enna Thetugkiraai? Endru Avanaik Kettaan.
16  Adharku Avan: En Sagodhararaith Thedugiren, Avargal Enge Aadu Meykkiraargal, Sollum Endraan.

17 andha Manidhan: Avargal Ivvitaththilirundhu Poivittaargal, Thoththaanukkup Povom Endru Avargal Sollakketten Endraan; Appozhudhu Yoseppu Than Sagodhararaith Thodarndhupoi, Avargalaith Thoththaanile Kandupidiththaan.
18  Avargal Avanaith Thooraththil Varakkandu, Avan Thangalukkuch Sameepamaai Varumunne, Avanaik Kolaiseyyumpadi Sadhiyosanaipanni,
19 oruvarai Oruvar Nokki: Idho, Soppanakkaaran Varugiraan,
20 naam Avanaik Kondru, Indhak Kuzhigal Ondrile Avanaip Pottu, Oru Thushtamirugam Avanaip Patchiththadhu Endru Solluvom Vaarungal; Avanudaiya Soppanangal Eppadi Mudiyum Paarppom Endraargal.
21 rooban Adhaik Kettu, Avanai Avargal Kaikkuth Thappuviththu, Avanai Avan Thagappanidaththukkuth Thirumpavum Kondupoga Manadhullavanaai,

22  Avargalai Nokki: Avanaik Kolla Vendaam, Neengal Raththam Sindhalaagaadhu; Neengal Avanmel Kai Vaiyaamal, Avanai Vanaandharaththilulla Indhak Kuzhiyile Pottuvidungal Endru Solli, Ivvidhamaai Rooban Avanai Avargal Kaikkuth Thappuviththaan.
23 yoseppu Than Sagodhararitaththil Serndhapodhu, Yoseppu Uduththikkondirundha Palavaruna Angiyai Avargal Kazhatri,
24  Avanai Eduththu, Andhak Kuzhiyile Pottaargal; Adhu Thanneerillaadha Verunguzhiyaayirundhadhu.

25  Pinbu, Avargal Pojananjeyyumpadi Utkaarndhaargal; Avargal Thangal Kangalai Eredukkumpodhu, Idho, Keeleyaaththilirundhu Varugira Ismavelarudaiya Koottaththaik Kandaargal; Avargal Egipdhukkuk Kondupogumpadi Kandhavarkkangalaiyum Pisin Thailaththaiyum Vellaippolaththaiyum Ottagangalmel Etrikkondu Vandhaargal.
26  Appozhudhu Yoodhaa Than Sagodhararai Nokki: Naam Nammudaiya Sagodharanaik Kondru, Avan Raththaththai Maraippadhinaal Laabam Enna?

27 avanai Indha Ismavelarukku Vitruppoduvom Vaarungal; Namadhu Kai Avanmel Padaadhiruppadhaaga; Avan Nammudaiya Sagodharanum Nammudaiya Maamsamumaai Irukkiraane Endraan. Avan Sagodharar Avan Sollukku Inanginaargal.

28  Andha Varththagaraana Meedhiyaaniyar Kadandhupogirapodhu, Avargal Yoseppai Andhak Kuzhiyilirundhu Thookkiyeduththu, Avanai Ismavelar Kaiyil Irupadhu Vellikkaasukku Vitruppottaargal. Avargal Yoseppai Egipthirkuk Konduponaargal.
29 pinbu, Rooban Andhak Kuzhiyinidaththukkuth Thirumpipponapodhu, Yoseppu Kuzhiyil Illaiyendru Kandu, Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu,
30  Than Sagodhararidaththukkuth Thirumbi Vandhu: Ilaignan Illaiye, Aiyo! Naan Enge Poven Endraan.
31 avargal Yoseppin Angiyai Eduththu, Oru Vellaattuk Kataavai Adiththu, Andha Angiyai Raththaththile Thoiththu,
32  Pala Varunamaana Andha Angiyaith Thangal Thagappanidaththukku Anuppi: Idhai Naangal Kandeduththom, Idhu Ummudaiya Kumaaran Angiyo, Allavo, Paarum Endru Sollachsonnaargal.
33  Yaakkobu Adhaik Kandu, Idhu En Kumaaranudaiya Angidhaan, Oru Thushtamirugam Avanaip Patchiththup Pottadhu, Yoseppu Peerunduponaan Endru Pulambi,
34  Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththu, Than Araiyil Rattuk Kattikkondu, Aneganaal Than Kumaaranukkaagath Thukkiththukkondirundhaan.

35  Avanudaiya Kumaarar Kumaaraththigal Ellaarum Avanukku Aarudhal Sollavandhu Nindraargal; Aanaalum Avan Aarudhalukku Dtankodaamal, Naan Thukkaththode En Kumaaranidaththil Paadhaalaththil Iranguven Endraan. Ivvidhamaai Avanudaiya Thagappan Avanukkaaga Azhudhukondirundhaan.
36 andha Meedhiyaaniyar Yoseppai Egipthile Paarvonin Piradhaaniyum Thalaiyaarigalukku Adhipadhiyumaagiya Poththipaar Enbavanidaththil Vitraargal.
